emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Dunbar Dramatic Club members including E. Kemp, Mable Brice, Florence Hardy, Luvenia Adams, Maggie Gibson, Lucille Barnes, Leola Scott, O. Munden and Mary B. Greene, standing around small table with cake and flowers for Sixth Anniversary, in East End Elks, Lincoln Avenue
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 10, 1945, pg. 28 reads: "Sixth Anniversary and reception of the Dunbar Dramatic Club was held at the East End Elks Rest on Lincoln Avenue, last Friday. The interesting program was composed of many outstanding local personalities.  Members of the group shown above, are E. Kemp, Mable Brice, Florence Hardy, Luvenia Adams, Maggie Gibson, Lucille Barnes, Leola Scott, O. Munden and Mary B. Greene. - Harris Photo."
